work.title: Solutions/Technical Consultant, Professional Services
description: Developed custom Sitecore components and functionality catered to client's needs
Advised clients on best practices for code implementation and site architecture
Collaborated with DevOps teams to improve continuous integration and deployment pipelines
Fostered strong client relationships to ensure clear communication and successful project outcomes

work.title: Senior Software Engineer, Product Support Services
description: Coordinated training schedules for all new team members onboarding with the North America team
Instructor and examiner in C#, .NET Core, and Sitecore technologies for new team members
Led knowledge-sharing sessions to enahnce team expertise
Developed tools for the support team, and contributed code to the product team

work.title: Software Engineer, Product Support Services
description: Supported customers by addressing product issues and delivering solutions within contracted SLAs
Developed patches/diagnostic pages for customers
Reported bugs and feature requests, updated documentation and knowledge base articles
Participated in 24x7x365 on-call support rotation providing customer support globally at any time

work.title: Integrated Systems Engineering Co-op
description: Regression test and troubleshoot MX products with other engineers and technicians
Develop new C# utilities and maintain old software utilities for testing
Update Systems documents and provide general Systems team support
Volunteered to assist in organizing and managing volleyball events in the workplace

work.title: NPI Project Engineering Co-op
description: Supported the Project Engineering group with engineering test part acquisition
Manage documentation, parts, and assemblies in WESCAM's ERP system
Used VBA to create custom excel tools for specific applications

school.title: Bachelor of Engineering, Mechatronics and Management
description: Mechatronics combines concepts of Mechanical, Electrical, Software Engineering
Management designation included Finance, Marketing, Business Operations, and more
Completed 16-month Co-op in addition to a five-year academic schedule

projects.title: PokeGuesser
projects.shortDescription: A Pokemon guessing game built with React & TypeScript.  The project is still under construction, but future plans include integrating ChatGPT for a more engaging user experience.
description: A Pokemon guessing game built built with React & TypeScript, and deployed to GitHub Pages
Retrieves data by consuming the RESTful API PokeAPI (https://pokeapi.co)
Interacts with the API by using the 'pokenode-ts' node module, built with predefined types and auto-caching
Future plans include integrating with AI (like ChatGPT) for a more interactive experience

projects.title: jasst.github.io/jasstsg
projects.shortDescription: The site you are on right now!  It is built with React & TypeScript and serves as both my resume and portfolio.  Thank you for taking an interest in me!
description: My personal website, built with React & TypeScript, and deployed to GitHub Pages
Both a resume and portfolio showcasing my work experience, personal projects, and technical skills

projects.title: TheTallTankard
projects.shortDescription: A React app meant to replace an earlier .NET Core app of a similar name, it instead hosts D&D 5E tools like a dice roller and ability score calculator.  Includes a planned search bar for searching D&D 5E SRD content.
description: A React app that hosts D&D 5E tools, originally intended to replace a more complex .NET Core application
Implemented tools for rolling dice and calculating ability scores, supplementing gameplay and character creation
Future plans include having the search bar retrieve freely accessible informaiton of the D&D 5E SRD

projects.title: Mortgage Calculator
projects.shortDescription: A financial calculator app built using HTML, JavaScript, and Bootstrap, featuring mortgage payment calculations displayed a table or with visualizations built using Chart.js.
description: An application for mortgage payment calculations with a clean and intuitive user interface
Used Chart.js to display clear visualizations of loan payment information over the entire amortization period
Future plans include adding more calculators, loan comparisons, and custom additional payments

projects.title: TheTallTankardTavern
projects.shortDescription: A .NET Core MVC app to manage data for a D&D 5E campaign, allowing remote access for players to track character progress. Hosted on IIS for real-time updates and seamless data management.
description: A .NET Core MVC app for managing character data, items, combat, and more
Utilizes AJAX to make small updates for live events like changes in HP, spell slots, or money held by a character
Hosted on IIS, providing players with remote access to view and update their character data in real-time
Future plans include rebuilding this application with .NET Core or Node.js for the back-end, and Next.js with TypeScript for the front-end

projects.title: SmartWalker
projects.shortDescription: McMaster Mechatronics Engineering capstone project, an assistive walker for those who need them.  This project used OpenCV to detect ArUco markers for navigation, Arduinos with PID control to actuate the wheel motors, and socket programming for Bluetooth and Ethernet communication.
description: Assistive walker with autonomous navigation
Utilized OpenCV and ArUco marker detection in Python on a raspberry pi, for positioning and autonomous navigation.
Implemented PID control for wheel motors using Arduino
Socket programming for Bluetooth (between RPi and mobile app) and Ethernet (between Rpi and Arduinos) communication
